column5: Hello from Kitchener! Anyone know a site for easy sled build? I'm not the most handiest. Thanks.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HjSMfaUkoaw Just do a search for smitty sled plans
Value Village or Salvation Army stores are good starts to pick up cheap used skis
Here's another that allows leaving the flip over hut attached to the Smitty Sled. http://www.iceshanty.com/ice_fishing/index.php?topic=261490.140
Thanks everyone. Some really good advise and some clever builds. Mr.Topwater!
